Sinopse: After a massive shootout, a mysterious stranger (Van Damme) arrives at a local hospital on the brink of death. Then, a foreign gang brazenly comes to the hospital to hunt him down. With enough twists and turns, KILL'EM ALL will keep you guessing until the final bullet is fired.—Sony Pictures
